Rapid Diagnostic Test for HBsAg: Rapid diagnostic test for hepatitis is a visual, rapid, sensitive and 
accurate one step immunoassay for the qualitative detection of Hepatitis B Surface Antigen (HBsAg) in human 
serum or plasma. Detail steps are enclosed in Annexure 11.
Rapid Diagnostic Test for HIV/AIDS: The test is a screening test for anti-HIV-1 & anti-HIV-2. Detail steps 
are enclosed in Annexure 12.
